transcript:
so how do you stop comparing yourself
well the quote that I like to remember
when I think about comparing myself is
that you can't compare your chapter ones
to somebody else's chapter 20. so maybe
you're looking at somebody on Instagram
and you're like oh my God they have the
best body I want that body and then you
work out for a couple weeks and then
your body does not look like their body
but a lot of times when you see someone
who has an incredible body that's like
five six seven years of work their
chapter 20 is way further along than
your chapter one but you also have to
realize this person once started at
chapter one as well and then work
through every single chapter to get to
where they are now so as long as you
start stop looking at other people and
all you do is compare yourself to who
you were yesterday and try to be better
than you were yesterday you will see
incremental improvements you fast
forward that for years you're a
completely different person
